text: Fort Nelson is a Canadian town in British Columbia, Canada. Fort Nelson is in the Northern Rockies Regional Municipality and is also in the northeastern corner of British Columbia. The population of Fort Nelson was 2,611 at the 2021 census. Around Fort Nelson is Fort Nelson River, Muskwa River and Prophet River. The forests in Fort Nelson are part of Canada's boreal forest. ==Other websites== *Town of Fort Nelson's Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Fort Nelson, British Columbia
